title: How to Make a Hot Banana Snack

steps.headline: Go to the store and buy fresh bananas.
When you get home, fire up your grill.
steps.description: This will be used to make the warm banana treats.

steps.headline: Put as many bananas as you are cooking on the grill.
Cook each banana for about 4 minutes.
When the bananas are fully cooked, you can tell by the banana being caramelized.
Take the bananas off the stove, and put them on a plate.
Peel the bananas.
steps.description: Cut off the tip of each end.

steps.headline: Melt chocolate (Try milk chocolate.)
steps.description: And drizzle it over the banana.

steps.headline: Let the tasty banana treat cool, and enjoy!

text: Go to the store and buy fresh bananas.  When you get home, fire up your grill. This will be used to make the warm banana treats. Put as many bananas as you are cooking on the grill.  Cook each banana for about 4 minutes. Flip every minute. When the bananas are fully cooked, you can tell by the banana being caramelized.  Take the bananas off the stove, and put them on a plate.  Peel the bananas. Cut off the tip of each end. Melt chocolate (Try milk chocolate.) And drizzle it over the banana. Let the tasty banana treat cool, and enjoy!
